recipes.name: Salted Caramel
recipes.description: The union of sweet and savory always works. Finish your desserts with salty caramel!

recipeInstructions.text: Measure brown sugar and cream into a saucepan. Heat until boiling and stir while it cooks up into a thickened sauce, about 10 minutes.
Take the saucepan from the stove, season with salt, and let it cool down. The sauce will thicken in the fridge.

recipes.name: Jalopeño Popper Grilled Cheese
recipes.description: Jalapeño popper grilled cheese sandwiches are for any sort of spicy food fan but especially for the jalapeño poppers lovers of the world. Made with pickled jalapeños, cream cheese, and good ol' American cheese, these sandwiches are always a big hit in my house, especially on cold and blustery days.
recipeIngredient: Pickled Jalapeño slices, according to taste
Sliced American cheese(or cheese of your choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat
Lightly butter one side of all the bread slices

Divide the cream cheese between two of the slices, spreading it out evenly on the un-buttered side of the bread. Lay the jalapeños halves over the cream cheese. Lay the American cheese over the jalapeños and add the second piece of bread, butter side up.

Place the sandwiches in the pan and cover the pan with a lid or piece of aluminum foil; this will help to retain the heat in the pan and melt the cheese. Heat each side of the sandwich until desired darkness and until the cheese inside is melted. Slice and serve warm.

Use electric beaters to beat the cream in bowl until soft peaks form. Fold in 160g curd and three-quarters of the marshmallows. Crumble 4 merengues and half the biscuits over the cream mixture. Stir gently to combine
Spoon one-third of the cream mixture into a 2l serving bowl. Crumble over 2 of the remaining biscuits. Add half of the remaining cream then top with the remaining curd and 2 more crumbled biscuits.
Top with the remaining cream mixture. Crumble over the remaining meringue and biscuits. Scatter over remaining marshmallows to serve.
